column6:
Newly renovated contemporary ranch style historic home. Located 15 minutes from central downtown San Antonio! Close enough to have fun, but far enough to avoid the noise/craziness of central downtown SA!

Park downtown for around $10 or Uber/ Lyft for about $10.

Enjoy Starbucks coffee every morning!

Get to play with a Nest thermostat, Amazons' Echo \
column9: Historic Home Near Downtown, Alamo, and Riverwalk.
